text: Gianluigi Saccaro (29 December 1938 - 17 February 2021) was an Italian fencer. He won a gold medal at the 1960 Summer Olympics, a silver at the 1964 Games and a bronze at the 1968 Games. He also competed at the 1972 Olympics, both individually and with the Italian team, but failed to reach the finals. He was born in Milan. Saccaro died on 17 February 2021 at the age of 82.Addio Saccaro, l’ultimo spadista d’oro ai Giochi di Roma 1960 ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympic silver medalists for Italy Category:Olympic gold medalists for Italy Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Italy Category:Italian fencers Category:Sportspeople from Milan
title: Gianluigi Saccaro
